text: Rick Falkvinge (born Dick Greger Augustsson, January 21, 1972, Gothenburg, Sweden ) is a Swedish information technology entrepreneur and founder of the Swedish Pirate Party. He is currently an activist of the Pirate Party. == References == == Other websites == * * Rickard Falkvinge on TorrentFreak Category:Swedish businesspeople Category:People from Gothenburg Category:Living people Category:1972 births
title: Rick Falkvinge
